body:
Follow up from [this](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/7421#issuecomment-391767740) progress update.

To support the release and PR testing process, we are working on deploying an instance of CDash  on our Kubernetes cluster.  The CDash service will receive, store, and aggregate information related to the builds of each Spack package.  The CDash web application will provide a dashboard that project maintainers will use to keep track of which packages are building and which are in need of updating.
title: Deploy CDash on Kubernetes Cluster
